entities.name: room
entities.description: The room is described as having a door that the creature can stretch its wings in. The text states 'had room to stretch its wings'.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is mentioned as the location where the creature stagers into after forcing its way through metal doors. The text states 'staggered into Diagon Alley'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people clinging to the creature's back. The text states 'with Harry, Ron, and Hermione still clinging to its back'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people clinging to the creature's back. The text states 'with Harry, Ron, and Hermione still clinging to its back'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people clinging to the creature's back. The text states 'with Harry, Ron, and Hermione still clinging to its back'.

entities.name: creature
entities.description: The creature is described as having a horned head and wings that it can stretch. The text states 'Turning its horned head toward the cool outside air...it took oﬀ'.

relationships.description: The creature enters Diagon Alley after forcing its way through metal doors. The text states 'staggered into Diagon Alley'.

The creature exits the room by stretching its wings and taking off. The text states 'had room to stretch its wings: Turning its horned head toward the cool outside air it could smell beyond the entrance, it took oﬀ'.
The creature carries Harry on its back. The text states 'with Harry, Ron, and Hermione still clinging to its back'.
The creature carries Ron on its back. The text states 'with Harry, Ron, and Hermione still clinging to its back'.
The creature carries Hermione on its back. The text states 'with Harry, Ron, and Hermione still clinging to its back'.
